    • Dashboards and Data Science

  • Tidy data for efficiency, reproducibility, and collaboration - openscapes.org
  • Tidy data Paper - Original paper by Hadley Wickham (founder of R) who pioneered the concept of tidy data - https://vita.had.co.nz/papers/tidy-data.pdf
  • Tidy data - informal and example code heavy (in R) version - tidyverse.org
  • Chart Chooser — Juice Analytics - https://www.juiceanalytics.com/chartchooser

About

Bring your energy and enthusiasm to this years hackthon. Leave with technical excellence, enabled by Omnibond and the NSF-funded Science Gateways Community Institute (SGCI) along with partners such as Intel HPC, ORNL, Voltron Data, Google Cloud, TACC, and Globus. We have joined forces in creating a diverse new generation of HPC data scientists and programmers.
